title: Doctor Who: Missing Episodes - Fan-Made Animation Collection V5
description:
A collection of fan-made animations of missing Doctor Who episodes, as well as several animated Doctor Who audio plays. Quality varies considerably from episode to episode - most of these have been downloaded straight from Youtube. I have also included some animated reconstructions (where telesnaps are animated to move and talk.) None of the animated episodes released on official DVDs are included.



Contents:

- "Marco Polo, Episode 1: The Roof of the World" - animated by: Neil Smith; Color Animation, 2D (Season One, William Hartnell, )

- "Marco Polo, Episodes 1-7" - animated by: Stephen Cox; B+W Animation, 3D (Season One, William Hartnell)

- "The Crusade, Episodes 2 + 4" - animated by: Stephen Cox; B+W Animation, 3D (Season Two, William Hartnell)

- "Galaxy 4, Episodes 1, 2 + 4" - animated by: Stephen Cox; B+W Animation, 3D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "Galaxy 4, Episodes 2 + 4" - animated by: drwhoanimator; B+W Animation, 2D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "Mission to the Unknown" - animated by: Adam Bullock; Color Animation, 2D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "Mission to the Unknown" - animated by: David B, Ian Levine; B+W Animation, 2D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "The Myth Makers, Episodes 1-4" - animated by: Stephen Cox; B+W Animation, 3D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "The Daleks' Masterplan, Episodes 1, 3-4, 6-9 + 11-12" - animated by: Stephen Cox; B+W Animation, 3D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "The Daleks' Masterplan, Episode 7: The Feast of Steven" - animated by: Adam Bullock; B+W Animation, 2D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "The Massacre, Episodes 1-4" - animated by: Stephen Cox; B+W Animation, 3D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "The Celestial Toymaker, Episodes 1-3" - animated by: Stephen Cox; B+W Animation, 3D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "The Savages, Episodes 1-4" - animated by: Stephen Cox; B+W Animation, 3D (Season Three, William Hartnell)

- "The Tenth Planet, Episode 4" - animated by: Aaron J Climas; B+W Animation, 3D (Season Four, William Hartnell)

- "The Power of the Daleks, Episodes 1 + 2" - animated by: Unknown; B+W Animated Reconstructions, 2D and 3D (Season Four, Patrick Troughton)

- "The Moonbase, Episodes 1 + 3" - animated by: Geoff Walsh; B+W Animation, 2D (Season Four, Patrick Troughton) 

- "The Moonbase, Episodes 1 + 3" - animated by: Unknown; B+W Animated Reconstructions, 2D and 3D (Season Four, Patrick Troughton)

- "The Macra Terror, Episodes 1-4" - animated by: drwhoanimator; B+W Animation, 2D (Season Four, Patrick Troughton)

- "The Evil of the Daleks, Episode 7" - animated by: Garrett Gilchrist, Adam Bullock, Loose Cannon, Unknown; B+W Animation and Reconstruction*, 2D and 3D (Season Four, Patrick Troughton)

	* Episode cuts between animated scenes and the Loose Cannon Reconstruction. This is an updated version containing more animation than the episode included in previous torrents.

- "The Web of Fear, Episode 3" - animated by: Adam Bullock; B+W Animation, 2D (Season Five, Patrick Troughton)

- "Fury from the Deep, Episode 1" - animated by: Adam Bullock; Color Animation, 2D (Season Five, Patrick Troughton)

- "Shada, Parts 1-6" - animated by: Ian Levine, Paul Martin, Adam Bullock, Humbert; Live-Action and Color Animation**, 2D (Season Seventeen, Tom Baker)

	** This serial was never completed due to a strike during production. The footage released onto DVD is intercut with Ian Levine's newly recorded and animated scenes.

- "The Pescatons, Part One" - animated by: doctorpoo21; Color Animation, 2D (BBC Audio, Tom Baker)

- "Exploration Earth: The Time Machine" - animated by: Adam Bullock; Color Animation, 2D (BBC Audio, Tom Baker)

- "Slipback, Part One and Two" - animated by: ScatmanJon; Color Animation, 2D (BBC Audio, Colin Baker)

- "The Wrong Doctor, Opening Scene" - animated by: ScatmanJon; Color Animation, 2D (Big Finish, Colin Baker)

- "Enemy of the Daleks, Episode 1" - animated by: doctorpoo21; Color Animation, 2D (Big Finish, Sylvester McCoy)



If you know of or have access to any fan animations of missing Doctor Who episodes (or Big Finish audios, etc) that you think should be included, please leave a comment below or send an email to: peri.lives AT gmail DOT com
